channel.title: Report on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in Report on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: Report - Simulation Validation
item.description: Synopsis Containerized simulation validation tool for Simer based simulations. # Run the reports. $ dse-report path/to/simulation Report Tool Codespace The Codespace (aka Devcontainer) of the DSE Simulation Development Platform is pre-configured with a command for running the Report tool. # Run the reports. $ dse-report path/to/simulation Setup Report is a containerized tool which validates a simulation using a collection of report templates included in the Report container. # Latest Report Container: $ docker pull ghcr.
